game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Age of Barbarian Ex is an action hack 'n 'slash game inspired to 80s, fantasy and sword-and-sorcery genre. Muscular barbarians, scantily clad girls, hordes of bloodthirsty monsters, a lot of gore, a pretty epic story and an addictive soundtrack! What's best in life?
